keyFacts: The document is an official government communication listing attorneys representing victims in the criminal case against Jeffrey Epstein (19 Cr. 490).

The list includes eight attorneys: Brad Edwards, Stan Pottinger, Gloria Allred, Sigrid McCawley, Alex Conlon, Bob losefsberg (likely Josefsberg), Kimberly Lerne (likely Lerner), and Ten Gibbs (likely Jen Gibbs).
The government acknowledges that not all victims are represented by counsel and that it does not know which victims plan to attend an upcoming court conference.
The email is addressed to Judge Richard M. Berman and is sent by an Assistant United States Attorney, indicating ongoing pre-trial proceedings in August 2019.
The government states it has not copied defense counsel on the email to respect victim privacy.
